metadata.title: CVE-2023-26242 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: afu_mmio_region_get_by_offset in drivers/fpga/dfl-afu-region.c in the Linuxkernel through 6.1.12 has an integer overflow.

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
linux-hwe-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.2, was needed').
linux-kvm package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
linux-aws package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
linux-azure package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
